#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
        int n,p,a;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        p=n;
        while(p > 0) {
                a = p%10;
                if (a != 0 && n%a != 0)
                {
                    printf("Invalid\n");
                    break;
                }
                p = p/10;
        }
        if (p == 0)
                printf("Valid\n");
        return 0;
}
